questions.question_text:
Add the following.
(i) ab – bc, bc – ca, ca – ab
(ii) a – b + ab, b – c + bc, c – a + ac
(iii) 2p²q – 3pq + 4, 5 + 7pq – 3p²q
(iv) l² + m², m² + n², n² + l², 2lm + 2mn + 2nl
hints: Arrange like terms one below the other
Carry over terms with no like terms as they are

hints: Change subtraction to addition of additive inverse
Change signs of all terms in the expression being subtracted

Obtain the volume of rectangular boxes with the following length, breadth and height respectively.
(i) 5a, 3a², 7a⁴
(ii) 2p, 4q, 8r
(iii) xy, 2x²y, 2xy²
(iv) a, 2b, 3c

Obtain the product of
(i) xy, yz, zx
(ii) a, – a², a³
(iii) 2, 4y, 8y², 16y³
(iv) a, 2b, 3c, 6abc
(v) m, – mn, mnp
